dsOverview.title: NESS NOAA Polar Orbiter Observations (TBM), 1978Oct-1989

summary.p: Basic TOVS satellite sounder data. Visible, infrared, U wave, stratospheric channels. NCAR has all this data for the FGGE year and later.
